value.name: California Senate Approves Plan to Decertify and Limit Immunity for Rogue Cops
value.description: State Senate Democrats advance police reforms that would permanently strip bad officers of their badges as well as end cash bail for low-level arrests.

value.name: California bill would create a system to get rid of dangerous cops

value.name: In undermining police accountability bill, Umberg sides with abusive cops
value.description: The Kenneth Ross Jr. Police Decertification Act of 2021 (Senate Bill 2) introduced by state Sen. Steven Bradford, D-Gardena, seeks to remedy this failure in our system of accountability.
